mapper.select: SELECT no, title, singer, poster, num FROM (SELECT no, title, singer, poster, rownum as num FROM (SELECT no, title, singer, poster FROM genie_music ORDER BY no)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT no, cno, title, poster FROM genie_music WHERE cno LIKE '%'||#{cno}||'%' ORDER BY no ASC OFFSET #{start} ROWS FETCH NEXT 12 ROWS ONLY
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/12.0) FROM genie_music WHERE cno LIKE '%'||#{cno}||'%'
